description: This tail coat parka is based on the iconic style of the Black Crows technical fabrics. Intended for high mountain and all terrain, this highly technical jacket is made with their new ultra waterproof and breathable Xpore layer. This model is the combination of style, thinness and high performance. Its exterior sobriety is in contrast with the bright interiors with multiple chevron waterproofing strips of the year 2022.
name: Black Crows Ora Xpore Ripstop Jacket - Mens
